teka.name: Eldritch Blast
teka.description: Channels eldritch power into a weak beam of dark energy
teka.cast_message: {caster} channels eldritch power, firing a beam of dark energy at {target}!
teka.hit_message: Dark energy sears through {target} for {damage} force damage!

dobuza.name: Ray of Sickness
dobuza.description: Hurls a bolt of toxic green energy that poisons the target
dobuza.cast_message: {caster} hurls a bolt of toxic green energy at {target}!
dobuza.hit_message: Poison courses through {target}'s veins for {damage} poison damage!

muda.name: Summon Lesser Beast
muda.description: Opens a minor rift to summon a creature from the void
muda.cast_message: {caster} opens a rift to the void, summoning a creature!
muda.hit_message: A creature emerges from the shadows to serve {caster}!

kateka.name: Eldritch Spear
kateka.description: Unleashes a powerful beam of corrupting dark energy
kateka.cast_message: {caster} unleashes a beam of corrupting dark energy at {target}!
kateka.hit_message: Dark corruption ravages {target} for {damage} force damage!

dakima.name: Acid Arrow
dakima.description: Conjures a stream of corrosive acid that melts through armor
dakima.cast_message: {caster} conjures a stream of corrosive acid, spraying {target}!
dakima.hit_message: Acid melts through flesh and armor for {damage} acid damage!

kamuda.name: Summon Beast
kamuda.description: Opens a dark rift to summon a more powerful creature from beyond
kamuda.cast_message: {caster} opens a dark rift, summoning a creature from beyond!
kamuda.hit_message: A dark entity emerges to do {caster}'s bidding!

tamikar.name: Hunger of Hadar
tamikar.description: Unleashes an explosive blast of concentrated dark energy
tamikar.cast_message: {caster} unleashes an explosive blast of dark energy at {target}!
tamikar.hit_message: Dark energy explodes violently for {damage} force damage!

dobumaru.name: Cloudkill
dobumaru.description: Creates a noxious cloud of toxic mist that poisons all enemies
dobumaru.cast_message: {caster} creates a noxious cloud of toxic mist!
dobumaru.hit_message: Poisonous fumes choke all enemies for {damage} poison damage!

giteka.name: Eldritch Chain
giteka.description: Fires a crackling beam of intense dark energy
giteka.cast_message: {caster} fires a crackling beam of intense dark energy at {target}!
giteka.hit_message: Eldritch energy crackles through {target} for {damage} force damage!

gimuda.name: Summon Greater Beast
gimuda.description: Tears open a greater rift to summon a powerful otherworldly entity
gimuda.cast_message: {caster} tears open a greater rift, summoning a powerful entity!
gimuda.hit_message: A fearsome creature materializes from the void!

kusateka.name: Eldritch Doom
kusateka.description: Channels overwhelming dark power into a devastating beam of annihilation
kusateka.cast_message: {caster} channels overwhelming dark power, firing a beam of annihilation at {target}!
kusateka.hit_message: Devastating dark energy obliterates {target} for {damage} force damage!

timimaru.name: Fear
timimaru.description: Summons a cloud of terrifying vapor that strikes fear into all enemies
timimaru.cast_message: {caster} summons a cloud of terrifying vapor!
timimaru.hit_message: Supernatural fear grips all enemies for {damage} psychic damage!

dakidaku.name: Acid Storm
dakidaku.description: Conjures a torrential downpour of corrosive acid from above
dakidaku.cast_message: {caster} conjures a torrential downpour of corrosive acid!
dakidaku.hit_message: Acid rains down, melting everything for {damage} acid damage!

dobudakidaku.name: Blight Storm
dobudakidaku.description: Summons a devastating deluge of dark poisonous acid from the void
dobudakidaku.cast_message: {caster} summons a devastating deluge of dark poisonous acid!
dobudakidaku.hit_message: Toxic acid dissolves everything it touches for {damage} acid damage!

kusamuda.name: Planar Binding
kusamuda.description: Rends the fabric of reality to summon a terrifying entity of immense power
kusamuda.cast_message: {caster} rends the fabric of reality, summoning a terrifying entity!
kusamuda.hit_message: An entity of immense dark power materializes to serve {caster}!
